question: My husband has been a diabetic for 1 year now and lately it seems his meds aren't working.  He's depressed because he sticks to the plan his doctor gave him but he is always hungry.  So he will eat and his blood sugars are sky high.  His blood sugars for the past 2 days at least have been 300 to 430 range.  Even when he doesn't eat anything his sugars are that high.  His blood sugar when he went to bed last night was 430, he took his 20 units of NPH last night at bed like normal.  When he woke up at 830 his sugars was 350.  He hasn't eaten anything but a piece of toast with no butter and a cup of hot tea, today and now its 1130am and his sugars are 330.  Its been over 2 hours since he ate.  I don't know how to help him and he is in that attitude of I will just never eat again.  How can I help him.
title: Husband needs help
